All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddEventFragment
AddEventFragment is a DialogFragment used for adding new events.
AdminDeleteEventTest
test for deletion of event as an administrator
AdministratorHome
This class will be the home page for organizer.
AdministratorViewEventFragment
This class is the fragment for the individual event view for Administrator
Announcement
Represents an announcement related to a specific event.
AnnouncementActivity
Announcement activity is made for testing navigation
AnnouncementRecyclerViewAdapter
 
AnnouncementRecyclerViewAdapter.OnItemClickListener
Interface for clickListener
AnnouncementTest
 
aSignUpTest
 
AttendeeCheckedInRecyclerViewAdapter
Adapter for the checked in attendees recycler view.
AttendeeCheckedInRecyclerViewAdapter.OnItemClickListener
This method is an interface for an item click listener.
AttendeeOrganizerHome
This class will be the home page for attendee/organizer
AttendeeSignedUpRecyclerViewAdapter
This class is the adapter for the RecyclerView with signed-up attendees.
AttendeeViewEventFragment
This class is the fragment for the individual event view
CameraActivity
Camera activity made for testing navigation and implementing QR code scanning functionality.
CaptureAct
This class extends the CaptureActivity provided by JourneyApps for QR code scanning functionality.
CheckedInAttendees
Activity to display checked-in attendees
Date
This class ia a representation of the date in a usable format to be displayed
DeviceID
This class represents the device ID entity.
Event
The Event class represents an event entity with various attributes such as ID, name, date, description, etc.
EventRecyclerViewAdapter
Adapter for the event recycler view
EventRecyclerViewAdapter.OnItemClickListener
This method is the interface for the item click listener
EventsOrganizerTest
tests to control the event organizer
EventTest
 
ExampleInstrumentedTest
Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
ExampleUnitTest
Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
FirestoreDB
The FirestoreDB class provides access to Firebase database instances and collection references through static methods.
MainActivity
This class represents the main activity of the application.
NavBarTest
Tests to see if navigation controller can switch from event(main page for users) to other activities
ProfileActivity
Profile activity made for testing navigation
QRCodeGenerator
This class provides utility methods for QR code generation
RecyclerViewAdapter
 
SignedUpAttendees
Activity to display signed-up attendees
User
The User class is a representation of the Attendee entity.
